param.name: vb_poll
param.label: vb_poll Table Name
param.description: The name of the table in your database that contains the vBulletin polls.

param.name: vb_pollvote
param.label: vb_pollvote Table Name
param.description: The name of the table in your database that contains the vote information for the vBulletin polls.

param.name: pollid
param.label: Poll ID
param.description: The ID number of the poll you wish to display.

param.name: forumdir
param.label: Forum Directory
param.description: The directory in which your vBulletin forum is located.

param.name: max
param.label: Max Bar Width
param.description: The maximum width for the bars that are displayed, in pixels.

param.name: color
param.label: Bar Color
param.description: The color in which to display the bars.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
